activities:
We collect some or all of the following information from users: name, title, email address, office telephone number, mobile telephone number, facsimile number, and mailing address.

Purpose:  We collect the phone numbers, facsimile numbers and email addresses to communicate with the users;  the mailing addresses are for use by customers; the photographs, names and titles are collected for user recognition.

When Received:  we collect the information at the time of user set-up or anytime thereafter the user desires.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The company will process organizational data and customer data
